job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the end-to-end lifecycle of applications-from PoC to production.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the traditional software engineering responsibility of managing an application from its initial concept (Proof of Concept) through to its live deployment and ongoing operation.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the maintenance and evolution of the tech stack and frameworks, and support new features and architecture improvements to ensure scalability and reliability.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the core software engineering tasks of maintaining, improving, and scaling existing software systems and their underlying architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with core teams to ensure high-quality, reusable components
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software engineering practice of building modular and reusable code, which is a fundamental aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: provide best practices, and help make data scientists and business users autonomous in building solutions end-to-end.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a role that not only develops but also enables others (data scientists, business users) to build solutions, implying an understanding of business needs and strategic enablement.

soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states the need for teamwork and interaction with other teams.
This emphasizes the collaborative nature of the role, working in conjunction with other teams.
Sharing knowledge and guiding others on best practices falls under communication and collaboration.
Mentoring is a key aspect of team collaboration and knowledge sharing.
Interviewing is a collaborative process involving communication with candidates and contributing to team building.
Onboarding involves communication and collaboration to integrate new members into the team.

soft_skills.phrase: Take responsibility for the end-to-end lifecycle of applications-from PoC to production.
soft_skills.justification: Taking end-to-end responsibility for an application's lifecycle demonstrates ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to the maintenance and evolution of the tech stack and frameworks
soft_skills.justification: Actively contributing to the improvement and evolution of the tech stack shows initiative and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: help grow a collaborative, inclusive, and innovative team culture.
soft_skills.justification: Contributing to team culture, especially fostering innovation, implies a proactive and adaptable mindset.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software engineering tasks such as application lifecycle management, maintenance, scalability, reliability, and collaboration. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, prompt engineering, RAG, or any AI-specific technologies or tasks. The role is described as 'Fullstack Software Engineer' and the responsibilities align with this title, making it a pure software engineering role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, using standard software engineering terminology. There are no mentions of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward and unambiguous.
